message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Given its high quality and functionality, it's valued at $150. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $135 for you. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the value this product can bring at a slightly discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
